root.title: All tasks runnable from root project

record.title: app:androidDependencies
record.tooltip: Displays the Android dependencies of the project.

record.title: app:signingReport
record.tooltip: Displays the signing info for each variant.

record.title: app:sourceSets
record.tooltip: Prints out all the source sets defined in this project.

record.title: app:assemble
record.tooltip: Assembles all variants of all applications and secondary packages.

record.title: app:assembleAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Assembles all the Test applications.

record.title: app:assembleDebug
record.tooltip: Assembles all Debug builds.

record.title: app:assembleRelease
record.tooltip: Assembles all Release builds.

record.title: app:build
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project.

record.title: app:buildDependents
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project and all projects that depend on it.

record.title: app:buildNeeded
record.tooltip: Assembles and tests this project and all projects it depends on.

record.title: app:bundleDebug
record.tooltip: Creates all Debug bundles.

record.title: app:bundleRelease
record.tooltip: Creates all Release bundles.

record.title: app:clean
record.tooltip: Deletes the build directory.

record.title: uildCache
record.tooltip: Deletes the build cache directory.

record.title: init
record.tooltip: Initializes a new Gradle build.

record.title: wrapper
record.tooltip: Generates Gradle wrapper files.

record.title: app:lintFix
record.tooltip: Runs lint on all variants and applies any safe suggestions to the source code.

record.title: buildEnvironment
record.tooltip: Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'.

record.title: app:buildEnvironment
record.tooltip: Displays all buildscript dependencies declared in project ':app'.

record.title: components
record.tooltip: Displays the components produced by root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'. [incubating]

record.title: app:components
record.tooltip: Displays the components produced by project ':app'. [incubating]

record.title: dependencies
record.tooltip: Displays all dependencies declared in root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'.

record.title: app:dependencies
record.tooltip: Displays all dependencies declared in project ':app'.

record.title: dependencyInsight
record.tooltip: Displays the insight into a specific dependency in root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'.

record.title: app:dependencyInsight
record.tooltip: Displays the insight into a specific dependency in project ':app'.

record.title: dependentComponents
record.tooltip: Displays the dependent components of components in root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'. [incubating]

record.title: app:dependentComponents
record.tooltip: Displays the dependent components of components in project ':app'. [incubating]

record.title: help
record.tooltip: Displays a help message.

record.title: app:help
record.tooltip: Displays a help message.

record.title: model
record.tooltip: Displays the configuration model of root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'. [incubating]

record.title: app:model
record.tooltip: Displays the configuration model of project ':app'. [incubating]

record.title: projects
record.tooltip: Displays the sub-projects of root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'.

record.title: app:projects
record.tooltip: Displays the sub-projects of project ':app'.

record.title: properties
record.tooltip: Displays the properties of root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout'.

record.title: app:properties
record.tooltip: Displays the properties of project ':app'.

record.title: tasks
record.tooltip: Displays the tasks runnable from root project 'layout_ConstraintLayout' (some of the displayed tasks may belong to subprojects).

record.title: app:tasks
record.tooltip: Displays the tasks runnable from project ':app'.

record.title: app:installDebug
record.tooltip: Installs the Debug build.

record.title: app:installDebugAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Installs the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

record.title: app:uninstallAll
record.tooltip: Uninstall all applications.

record.title: app:uninstallDebug
record.tooltip: Uninstalls the Debug build.

record.title: app:uninstallDebugAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Uninstalls the android (on device) tests for the Debug build.

record.title: app:uninstallRelease
record.tooltip: Uninstalls the Release build.

record.title: app:check
record.tooltip: Runs all checks.

record.title: app:connectedAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Installs and runs instrumentation tests for all flavors on connected devices.

record.title: app:connectedCheck
record.tooltip: Runs all device checks on currently connected devices.

record.title: app:connectedDebugAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Installs and runs the tests for debug on connected devices.

record.title: app:deviceAndroidTest
record.tooltip: Installs and runs instrumentation tests using all Device Providers.

record.title: app:deviceCheck
record.tooltip: Runs all device checks using Device Providers and Test Servers.

record.title: app:lint
record.tooltip: Runs lint on all variants.

record.title: app:lintDebug
record.tooltip: Runs lint on the Debug build.

record.title: app:lintRelease
record.tooltip: Runs lint on the Release build.

record.title: app:lintVitalRelease
record.tooltip: Runs lint on just the fatal issues in the release build.

record.title: app:test
record.tooltip: Run unit tests for all variants.

record.title: app:testDebugUnitTest
record.tooltip: Run unit tests for the debug build.

record.title: app:testReleaseUnitTest
record.tooltip: Run unit tests for the release build.
